meanings.definition: A unit of capacitance equal to one millionth of a farad.
meanings.sent1: I need to replace the microfarads in the circuit to fix the problem.
meanings.sent2: The electronic device requires specific microfarads to function properly.
meanings.sent3: Why did the capacitor break up with the resistor? Because it found a new love in microfarads!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a collection of tiny microfarads, storing every detail of the past.
meanings.sent5: The scientist measured the capacitance in microfarads, ensuring accuracy in the experiment.
